content.text: Pathway planning shall include co-ordination with the authorities responsible for the management of the  water course (risk of dredging, ships anchors, tides).

Only cables that are specifically designed or protected by means of a protective cover shall be laid in the  vicinity of the shore. The term "vicinity of the shore" shall mean the entire embankment down to the bottom of  the waterway and the shore-line between the high and low water marks.
